{
  WApplication *app = new TreeViewDragDrop(env);
  app->setTwoPhaseRenderingThreshold(0);
  app->setTitle("WTreeView Drag & Drop");
  app->useStyleSheet("styles.css");
  app->messageResourceBundle().use(WApplication::appRoot() + "about");
  app->refresh();
  
  return app;
}
